alert.note: Alert for Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Northeast Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 1:48PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Weld County through 215 PM MDT... At 148 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Grover to 4 miles east of Barnesville, or along a line extending from 32 miles southeast of Cheyenne to 18 miles east of Greeley. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Briggsdale and Barnesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Northeast Weld County
